name: Overboard
summary_text: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her they're husband and wife.

name: All Good Things
summary_text: Mr. David Marks was suspected but never tried for killing his wife Katie who disappeared in 1982, but the truth is eventually revealed.

name: Stand Up Guys
summary_text: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.

name: The Farewell
summary_text: A Chinese family discovers their grandmother has only a short while left to live and decide to keep her in the dark, scheduling a wedding to gather before she dies.

name: Grave Encounters
summary_text: For their ghost hunting reality show, a production crew locks themselves inside an abandoned mental hospital that's supposedly haunted - and it might prove to be all too true.

name: The Astronaut's Wife
summary_text: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.

name: Before We Go
summary_text: Two strangers stuck in Manhattan for the night grow into each other's most trusted confidants when an evening of unexpected adventure forces them to confront their fears and take control of their lives.

name: The American President
summary_text: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

name: Macbeth
summary_text: Macbeth, the Thane of Glamis, receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland. Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, Macbeth murders his king and takes the throne for himself.

name: Lolita
summary_text: An English professor falls for a minor , and has to face the consequences of his actions.

name: Arthur Christmas
summary_text: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours.

name: Sneakers
summary_text: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

name: The New Mutants
summary_text: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.

name: The Last Temptation of Christ
summary_text: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

name: Little Women
summary_text: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

name: Westworld
summary_text: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

name: Airlift
summary_text: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

name: Song of the Sea
summary_text: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

name: Baby
summary_text: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

name: The Dig
summary_text: An archaeologist embarks on the historically important excavation of Sutton Hoo in 1938.

name: The Beguiled
summary_text: The unexpected arrival of a wounded Union soldier at a girls school in Virginia during the American Civil War leads to jealousy and betrayal.

name: Wolf
summary_text: Publisher Will Randall becomes a werewolf and has to fight to keep his job.

name: Victor Frankenstein
summary_text: Told from Igor's perspective, we see the troubled young assistant's dark origins, his redemptive friendship with the young medical student Viktor Von Frankenstein, and become eyewitnesses to the emergence of how Frankenstein became the man - and the legend - we know today.

name: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
summary_text: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

name: Live by Night
summary_text: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan.

name: Wicker Park
summary_text: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.

name: A Silent Voice: The Movie
summary_text: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

name: Crash
summary_text: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.

name: Hudson Hawk
summary_text: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
summary_text: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

name: The Light Between Oceans
summary_text: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia raise a baby they rescue from a drifting rowing boat.

name: Secondhand Lions
summary_text: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.

name: Son of the Mask
summary_text: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.

name: Eight Legged Freaks
summary_text: Venomous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.

name: Bride of Chucky
summary_text: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

name: The Money Pit
summary_text: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

name: Gnomeo & Juliet
summary_text: Separated by a garden fence and a feud, are blue gnomes on one side and red gnomes on the other. This doesn't stop blue Gnomeo and red Juliet from falling in love with each other. Do they have a future together?

name: Raya and the Last Dragon
summary_text: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

name: The Cobbler
summary_text: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.

name: Menace II Society
summary_text: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

name: A Bridge Too Far
summary_text: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

name: Harvey
summary_text: Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.

name: The Loft
summary_text: Five married guys secretly share a penthouse loft in the city where they can carry out hidden affairs. But the fantasy becomes a nightmare, when they discover the dead body of a woman in the loft one of the group must be involved.

name: Magic Mike XXL
summary_text: Three years after Mike bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, he and the remaining Kings of Tampa hit the road to Myrtle Beach to put on one last blow-out performance.

name: The Salesman
summary_text: While both participating in a production of "Death of a Salesman," a teacher's wife is assaulted in her new home, which leaves him determined to find the perpetrator over his wife's traumatized objections.

name: The Legend of Hercules
summary_text: The origin story of the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

name: Queen of the Damned
summary_text: In this loose sequel to Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles (1994), the vampire Lestat becomes a rock star whose music wakes up the equally beautiful and monstrous queen of all vampires.

name: The 39 Steps
summary_text: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

name: Win Win
summary_text: A struggling lawyer and volunteer wrestling coach's chicanery comes back to haunt him when the teenage grandson of the client he has double-crossed comes into his life.

name: Koroshiya 1
summary_text: As sadomasochistic yakuza enforcer Kakihara searches for his missing boss he comes across Ichi, a repressed and psychotic killer who may be able to inflict levels of pain that Kakihara has only dreamed of achieving.

name: The Majestic
summary_text: In 1951, a blacklisted Hollywood writer gets into a car accident, loses his memory and settles down in a small town where he is mistaken for a long-lost son.

name: Working Girl
summary_text: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

name: Pride
summary_text: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

name: The Experiment
summary_text: 26 men are chosen to participate in the roles of guards and prisoners in a psychological study that ultimately spirals out of control.

name: Where Eagles Dare
summary_text: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

name: Winter's Tale
summary_text: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.

name: The Longest Day
summary_text: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

name: Stonehearst Asylum
summary_text: An Oxford graduate takes up a job in a mental asylum, only to discover that the "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane, and that there is more going on than meets the eye.

name: Lords of Dogtown
summary_text: The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970's.

name: Night Watch
summary_text: A fantasy-thriller set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.

name: Burning
summary_text: Jong-su bumps into a girl who used to live in the same neighborhood, who asks him to look after her cat while she's on a trip to Africa. When back, she introduces Ben, a mysterious guy she met there, who confesses his secret hobby.

name: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
summary_text: Five sisters in 19th century England must cope with the pressures to marry while protecting themselves from a growing population of zombies.

name: Everybody Wants Some!!
summary_text: In 1980, a group of college baseball players navigate their way through the freedoms and responsibilities of unsupervised adulthood.

name: OMG: Oh My God!
summary_text: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

name: The Golden Child
summary_text: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child whom dark forces want to eliminate.

name: The Man Who Knew Infinity
summary_text: The story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, and his friendship with his mentor, Professor G.H. Hardy.

name: Leave No Trace
summary_text: A father and his thirteen-year-old daughter are living an ideal existence in a vast urban park in Portland, Oregon when a small mistake derails their lives forever.

name: The World's Fastest Indian
summary_text: The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

name: 5 Centimeters Per Second
summary_text: Told in three interconnected segments, we follow a young man named Takaki through his life as cruel winters, cold technology, and finally, adult obligations and responsibility converge to test the delicate petals of love.

name: Logan's Run
summary_text: A police officer in the future uncovers the deadly secret behind a society that worships youth.

name: My Blueberry Nights
summary_text: A young lonely woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of offbeat characters along the way.

name: The Dilemma
summary_text: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

name: Casanova
summary_text: The fabled romantic Giacomo Casanova, after failing to win the affection of the Venetian woman Francesca Bruni, strives to discover the real meaning of love.

name: Soldier
summary_text: A soldier trained from birth is deemed obsolete and dumped on a waste planet where he is reluctantly taken in by a community of defenseless, stranded wayfarers.

name: The Killing Fields
summary_text: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

name: Mid90s
summary_text: Follows Stevie, a thirteen-year-old in 1990s-era Los Angeles who spends his summer navigating between his troubled home life and a group of new friends that he meets at a Motor Avenue skate shop.

name: Vampire Academy
summary_text: Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human-half vampire, a guardian of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discreetly within our world. Her calling is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
summary_text: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

name: Joe Dirt
summary_text: After being abandoned by his parents at the Grand Canyon, Joe Dirt tells the story of his journey to find his parents.

name: Stealth
summary_text: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

name: Frankenstein
summary_text: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

name: Mousehunt
summary_text: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

name: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
summary_text: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

name: The Secret Life of Pets 2
summary_text: Continuing the story of Max and his pet friends, following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.

name: New Nightmare
summary_text: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

name: Loving Vincent
summary_text: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh (Robert Gulaczyk) to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

name: Away We Go
summary_text: A couple who is expecting their first child travel around the U.S. in order to find a perfect place to start their family. Along the way, they have misadventures and find fresh connections with an assortment of relatives and old friends who just might help them discover "home" on their own terms for the first time.

name: Master
summary_text: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster who uses the school children for criminal activities.

name: Heartbreakers
summary_text: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.

name: Flight of the Phoenix
summary_text: Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.

name: Quills
summary_text: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.

name: The Santa Clause 2
summary_text: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.
In 1971, a young and disoriented British soldier is accidentally abandoned by his unit following a riot on the deadly streets of Belfast.

name: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
summary_text: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

name: Mommy
summary_text: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.

name: The Eye
summary_text: Violinist Sydney Wells was accidentally blinded by her sister Helen when she was five years old. She submits to a cornea transplantation, and while recovering from the operation, she realizes that she is seeing dead people.

name: Flash Gordon
summary_text: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

name: My Own Private Idaho
summary_text: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

name: Sholay
summary_text: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

name: The Soloist
summary_text: A newspaper journalist discovers a homeless musical genius and tries to improve his situation.

name: Head-On
summary_text: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.
Several women enter a science fiction author's life over the course of a few years, after the author has lost the woman he considers his one true love.

name: Alive
summary_text: A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

name: Chaos
summary_text: Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

name: Wild Card
summary_text: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

name: Shine
summary_text: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

name: Florence Foster Jenkins
summary_text: The story of Florence Foster Jenkins, a New York heiress who dreamed of becoming an opera singer, despite having a terrible singing voice.

name: Walk of Shame
summary_text: A reporter's dream of becoming a news anchor is compromised after a one-night stand leaves her stranded in downtown L.A. without a phone, car, ID or money - and only 8 hours to make it to the most important job interview of her life.

name: Coneheads
summary_text: Aliens with conical crania crash-land on Earth.

name: The Crying Game
summary_text: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

name: Red Dawn
summary_text: It is the dawn of World War III. In mid-western America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

name: The Jewel of the Nile
summary_text: When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.

name: Taxi 2
summary_text: Police inspector Emilien and his taxi-driver pal Daniel are back, this time on the tail of a group of Japanese yakuza.

name: Great Expectations
summary_text: Modernization of Charles Dickens' classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

name: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
summary_text: A woman is made to realize that her prayers and sacrifice to save her boyfriend's life may have led him to a fate worse than death.

name: Special 26
summary_text: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

name: Ghosts of Mars
summary_text: In 2176, a Martian police unit is sent to pick up a highly dangerous criminal at a remote mining post. Upon arrival, the cops find that the post has become a charnel house.

name: Masterminds
summary_text: A guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery.

name: Tell No One
summary_text: An accidental discovery near a doctor's estate stirs up some painful memories eight years after his wife's hideous murder, and now, things are bound to take a turn for the unexpected. Does the good doctor know more than he's letting on?

name: Cannibal Holocaust
summary_text: During a rescue mission into the Amazon rainforest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

name: Executive Decision
summary_text: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

name: 3-Iron
summary_text: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

name: Jason X
summary_text: Jason Voorhees returns with a new look, a new machete, and his same murderous attitude as he is awakened on a spaceship in the 25th century.

name: Take Me Home Tonight
summary_text: Four years after graduation, an awkward high school genius uses his sister's boyfriend's Labor Day party as the perfect opportunity to make his move on his high school crush.

name: Mr. Right
summary_text: A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.

name: Planet 51
summary_text: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

name: The Lunchbox
summary_text: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

name: Stalag 17
summary_text: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

name: Crna macka, beli macor
summary_text: Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.

name: Open Water
summary_text: Based on the true story of two scuba divers accidentally stranded in shark infested waters after their tour boat has left.

name: Kalifornia
summary_text: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

name: Stuck on You
summary_text: Conjoined twins from Martha's Vineyard move to Los Angeles so that one of them can pursue an acting career.

name: Moonstruck
summary_text: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

name: The Three Musketeers
summary_text: France, 1625: Young d'Artagnan heads to Paris to join the Musketeers but the evil cardinal has disbanded them - save 3. He meets the 3, Athos, Porthos and Aramis, and joins them on their quest to save the king and country.

name: Sleeping with the Enemy
summary_text: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

name: Absolute Power
summary_text: Career thief Luther Whitney (Clint Eastwood) witnesses a horrific crime involving U.S. President Alan Richmond (Gene Hackman).

name: Kickboxer
summary_text: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
summary_text: The Mystery Inc. gang must save Coolsville from an attack of their past monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to take down the gang.

name: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
summary_text: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.

name: Little Man
summary_text: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

name: Bound
summary_text: Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

name: Transsiberian
summary_text: A Transsiberian train journey from China to Moscow becomes a thrilling chase of deception and murder when an American couple encounters a mysterious pair of fellow travelers.

name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
summary_text: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

name: Battle of the Sexes
summary_text: The true story of the 1973 tennis match between World number one Billie Jean King and ex-champ and serial hustler Bobby Riggs.

name: Alfie
summary_text: A cockney womanizer learns the hard way about the dangers of his actions.

name: Dolittle
summary_text: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

name: Hart's War
summary_text: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

name: The Triplets of Belleville
summary_text: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

name: The Producers
summary_text: A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
summary_text: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

name: Just Mercy
summary_text: World-renowned civil rights defense attorney Bryan Stevenson works to free a wrongly condemned death row prisoner.

name: Empire Records
summary_text: Twenty-four hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.

name: Who Am I
summary_text: Benjamin, a young German computer whiz, is invited to join a subversive hacker group that wants to be noticed on the world's stage.

name: Stuart Little 2
summary_text: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

name: Over the Top
summary_text: Tough trucker Lincoln Hawk is determined to win back his son and triumph at the world arm wrestling championships.

name: Hesher
summary_text: A young boy has lost his mother and is losing touch with his father and the world around him. Then he meets Hesher who manages to make his life even more chaotic.

name: Pain and Glory
summary_text: A film director reflects on the choices he's made in life as the past and present come crashing down around him.

name: Haider
summary_text: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

name: Courage Under Fire
summary_text: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

name: Wild Child
summary_text: A rebellious Malibu princess is shipped off to a strict English boarding school by her father.

name: Batman: The Killing Joke
summary_text: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

name: Arthur
summary_text: A drunken playboy stands to lose a wealthy inheritance when he falls for a woman his family doesn't like.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
summary_text: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

name: The Love Guru
summary_text: Pitka, an American raised outside of his country by gurus, returns to the States in order to break into the self-help business. His first challenge is to settle the romantic troubles and subsequent professional skid of a star hockey player whose wife left him for a rival athlete.

name: Tristan + Isolde
summary_text: An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne and the princess of the feuding Irish spells doom for the young lovers.

name: Don't Look Now
summary_text: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

name: The Muppet Christmas Carol
summary_text: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.

name: High Plains Drifter
summary_text: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

name: Veronica Mars
summary_text: Years after walking away from her past as a young private eye, Veronica Mars gets pulled back to her hometown, just in time for her high school reunion, in order to help her old flame Logan Echolls, who's embroiled in a murder mystery.

name: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore.
summary_text: When a depressed woman is burgled, she finds a new sense of purpose by tracking down the thieves alongside her obnoxious neighbour. But they soon find themselves dangerously out of their depth against a pack of degenerate criminals.

name: The Proposition
summary_text: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

name: An Officer and a Gentleman
summary_text: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

name: Cold War
summary_text: In the 1950s, a music director falls in love with a singer and tries to persuade her to flee communist Poland for France.

name: Last Tango in Paris
summary_text: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

name: Arbitrage
summary_text: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

name: The Cat Returns
summary_text: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

name: The Condemned
summary_text: Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor.

name: Ip Man 3
summary_text: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over a local school, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

name: Breakdown
summary_text: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
summary_text: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

name: Cassandra's Dream
summary_text: The tale of two brothers with serious financial woes. When a third party proposes they turn to crime, things go badly and the two become enemies.

name: Force Majeure
summary_text: A family vacationing in the French Alps is confronted with a devastating avalanche.

name: Love
summary_text: Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed.

name: Jungle
summary_text: A group of friends join a guide for a trek into the Bolivian jungle, searching for an Indian village. The men soon realize that the jungle is a difficult place to be.

name: Captive State
summary_text: Set in a Chicago neighborhood nearly a decade after an occupation by an extraterrestrial force, 'Captive State' explores the lives on both sides of the conflict - the collaborators and dissidents.

name: Nine Queens
summary_text: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

name: Black Rain
summary_text: Two NYC cops arrest a Yakuza member and must escort him when he's extradited to Japan.

name: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
summary_text: A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.

name: Dead Man's Shoes
summary_text: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

name: I Feel Pretty
summary_text: A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?

name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
summary_text: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

name: Show Me Love
summary_text: Two teenage girls in small-town Sweden. Elin is beautiful, popular, and bored with life. Agnes is friendless, sad, and secretly in love with Elin.

name: Jin ling shi san chai
summary_text: An American finds refuge during the 1937 Japanese invasion of Nanking in a church with a group of women. Posing as a priest, he attempts to lead the women to safety.

name: Leviathan
summary_text: In a Russian coastal town, Kolya is forced to fight the corrupt mayor when he is told that his house will be demolished. He recruits a lawyer friend to help, but the man's arrival brings further misfortune for Kolya and his family.

name: Keeping the Faith
summary_text: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

name: Ferdinand
summary_text: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

name: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
summary_text: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery, and H.A.L.

name: Boiler Room
summary_text: A college dropout, attempting to live up to his father's high standards, gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm which puts him on the fast track to success. But the job might not be as legitimate as it first appeared to be.

name: Frantic
summary_text: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
summary_text: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

name: Martha Marcy May Marlene
summary_text: Haunted by painful memories and increasing paranoia, a damaged woman struggles to re-assimilate with her family after fleeing an abusive cult.

name: 47 Meters Down
summary_text: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.

name: Pee-wee's Big Adventure
summary_text: When eccentric man-child Pee-wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

name: Don 2
summary_text: Don turns himself in and escapes with Vardhaan from prison, following which he recruits a team to steal currency printing plates from a bank in Berlin.

name: Asterix & Obelix: Mission Cleopatra
summary_text: Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.

name: U Turn
summary_text: A man heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him is forced to stop in an Arizona town where everything that can go wrong does go wrong.

name: Andaz Apna Apna
summary_text: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

name: The Rules of Attraction
summary_text: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

name: You Again
summary_text: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.

name: The Unborn
summary_text: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.

name: Airplane II: The Sequel
summary_text: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?

name: Weekend at Bernie's
summary_text: Two losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

name: I Spy
summary_text: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

name: Veer-Zaara
summary_text: Veer-Zaara is a saga of love, separation, courage and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.

name: The Hustle
summary_text: Two con women - one low rent and the other high class - team up to take down the men who have wronged them.

name: Dave
summary_text: An uncanny Presidential lookalike named Dave is recruited by the Secret Service to become a momentary stand-in for the President of the United States.

name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
summary_text: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

name: Repulsion
summary_text: A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.

name: Lakeview Terrace
summary_text: Based on a true story, a troubled and racist African-American L.A.P.D. Officer will stop at nothing to force out a friendly interracial couple who just moved in next door to him.

name: Sinister 2
summary_text: A young mother and her twin sons move into a rural house that's marked for death.

name: Don't Say a Word
summary_text: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

name: Scanners
summary_text: A scientist sends a man with extraordinary psychic powers to hunt others like him.

name: First Reformed
summary_text: A minister of a small congregation in upstate New York grapples with mounting despair brought on by tragedy, worldly concerns and a tormented past.

name: Revenge of the Nerds
summary_text: At Adams College, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self-respect.

name: Detroit
summary_text: Fact-based drama set during the 1967 Detroit riots in which a group of rogue police officers respond to a complaint with retribution rather than justice on their minds.

name: Chennai Express
summary_text: A man heading towards Rameshwaram via Chennai express to immerse his late grandfather's ashes unwillingly gets caught amidst goons after helping their boss's daughter and them board the train.

name: Man Up
summary_text: A single woman takes the place of a stranger's blind date, which leads to her finding the perfect boyfriend.

name: Super Mario Bros.
summary_text: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

name: An American Tail
summary_text: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

name: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
summary_text: Dave is deaf, and Wally is blind. They witness a murder, but it was Dave who was looking at her, and Wally who was listening.

name: City Slickers
summary_text: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

name: Truth or Dare
summary_text: A harmless game of Truth or Dare among friends turns deadly when someone - or something - begins to punish those who tell a lie or refuse the dare.

name: The Wedding Date
summary_text: Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis to hire a male escort to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fiancé, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.

name: The Brothers Bloom
summary_text: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

name: Ouija
summary_text: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

name: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
summary_text: A parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance Boyz n the Hood (1991), South Central (1992), Menace II Society (1993), Higher Learning (1995) and Juice (1992).

name: Departures
summary_text: A newly unemployed cellist takes a job preparing the dead for funerals.

name: Adrift
summary_text: A true story of survival, as a young couple's chance encounter leads them first to love, and then on the adventure of a lifetime as they face one of the most catastrophic hurricanes in recorded history.

name: The Father
summary_text: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

name: Dangerous Minds
summary_text: An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.

name: The Space Between Us
summary_text: The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street-smart girl to discover how he came to be.

name: Halloween II
summary_text: Laurie Strode struggles to come to terms with her brother Michael's deadly return to Haddonfield, Illinois; meanwhile, Michael prepares for another reunion with his sister.

name: The Pink Panther
summary_text: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink Panther".

name: Three Men and a Baby
summary_text: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

name: Three Days of the Condor
summary_text: A bookish CIA researcher finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

name: Rent
summary_text: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.

name: Tammy
summary_text: After getting fired and finding out her husband is cheating, Tammy hits the road with her profane, alcoholic grandmother.

name: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
summary_text: Deuce is tricked again into man-whoring by T.J., only in Amsterdam while other man-whores are being murdered in his midst.

name: Cabaret
summary_text: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

name: Miracle
summary_text: The true story of Herb Brooks, the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Soviet squad.
